summary: Lore-break as Kamina with this basic reskin!
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the High Collared Cloak from Cloaks of Skyrim to resemble Kamina\'s cape from Gurren Lagann.  Since it is a reskin, the [b]Cloaks of Skyrim mod is absolutely necessary.[/b]  Now, at last, everyone can fully lore-break as Kamina.  

[b][u]To install:[/b][/u]

[i]--Using NMM--[/i]

1) Install Cloaks of Skyrim.  It can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092/?]here[/url]

2) Hit the Download with manager button.

3) Activate mod.  Allow it to overwrite whatever pops up. 


[i]--Manually--[/i]

1) Install Cloaks of Skyrim.  It can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092/?]here[/url]

2) Extract the files from this mod, and copy the Data folder to your Skyrim directory.  

3) Let it overwrite anything there.

4) Remember to change the dragon battle music to Row Row Fight the Power for [i]maximum immersion.[/i]


[b][u]How to get it[/b][/u]

Unfortunately since I have essentially have no idea what I\'m doing, the fastest way to get the cape is to use the console.  

1) Make sure you have Cloaks of Skyrim installed.  

2) Open the console and type 
help “cloak – daedric”

3) Take whatever item code it gives you for the cape, and type
player.additem [b][i]*item code here*[/b][/i] 1

4) Begin kicking reason to the curb and doing the impossible.  



Special thanks to Shadowtroop who created the high collared mesh, and Nikinoodles who created the Cloaks of Skyrim mod.  Seriously, thanks for letting me upload this.  

Shadowtroops original mod:   [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27691/?]Shadowtroop\'s Projects[/url]
Nikinoodles Cloaks of Skyrim:  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092/?]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]
author: Avalanch_Man
